data.name: Bag Upgrade
data.desciption: Increase the max number of items you can carry by 50.

data.name: Camera
data.desciption: When you encounter Pokemon in the wild, you can use your camera to photograph them.

data.name: Egg
data.desciption: An egg can be hatch into any Pokemon by putting it into an incubator and then walking. The rarity of the hatched Pokemon is depend on its requiered walking distance, which 2 km be the common, 5 km be the uncommon, and 10 km be the rare.

data.name: Egg Incubator
data.desciption: A device that incubates an Egg as you walk until it is ready to hatch. A trainer will get one incubator with unlimited use for free, and all the additional incubators that bought from in-game shop or by visiting POKESTOP will breaks after 3 uses.

data.name: Great ball
data.desciption: A stronger version of the normal poke ball, have a higher chance to catch pokemon.

data.name: Hyper potion
data.desciption: A stronger version of the Super Potion, can heal pokemon 200 hp on use.

data.name: Incense
data.desciption: Incense with a mysterious fragrance that lures wild Pokemon to your location for 30 minutes.
data.cost: one for 808 for 50025 for 1250

data.name: Lucky Egg
data.desciption: A Lucky Egg that's filled with happiness! Earns double XP for 30 minutes.
data.cost: one for 808 for 50025 for 1250

data.name: Lure Module
data.desciption: A module that attracts Pokemon to a PokeStop for 30 minutes. The effect also benefits other people nearby.
data.cost: one for 100 8 for 680

data.name: Max Potion
data.desciption: Ultra version of the healing potion, will heal a Pokemon completely on use.

data.name: Max Revive
data.desciption: Ultra version of the revive, will revive a fainted Pokemon and restores its health to max.

data.name: Poke Ball
data.desciption: A device for catching wold Pokemon. It's thrown like a ball at a Pokemon, comfortably encapsulating its target.
data.cost: 20 for 1001000 for 460200 for 800

data.name: Storage Upgrade
data.desciption: Increase the max number of Pokemon you can carry by 50.

data.name: Potion
data.desciption: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It restores the Hp of one Pokemon by 20 points.

data.name: Razz Berry
data.desciption: Feed to a Pokemon, and it will be easier to catch on your next throw.

data.name: Revive
data.desciption: A medicine that can revive fainted Pokemon. It also restores half of a fainted Pokemon's maximum HP.

data.name: Super Potion
data.desciption: A stronger version of the normal potion, heal Pokemon 50 HP on use.

data.name: Ultra Ball
data.desciption: Ultra version of the Poke Ball, have an even higher chance to catch pokemon than the Great Ball.
